childDownloads.title: Beautiful Katamari Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The King of All Cosmos and the Prince have returned in amazing Next Generation brilliance! Beautiful Katamariâ„¢ brings the Katamari franchise into the next generation with online multiplayer, downloadable content and seamless gameplay for a wacky experience in the creative and delightful Katamari world. Play as the Prince or one of the cousins, new and old, to roll up objects in all-new outlandish stages and missions as you explore this brand new creative exploration. With this new era, the hit style of gameplay is able to present an experience only hinted at in previous games. Seamless katamari growing and animated presents add to the enjoyable experience that has captivated hardcore and casual gamers everywhere. Coming Fall 2007.
